alert.note: Alert for Osage (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 6:31PM CDT until July 14 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN OSAGE COUNTY... At 631 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles west of Bigheart to 4 miles southeast of Kaw City, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations in or near the path include... Bartlesville... Pawhuska... Fairfax... Shidler... Burbank... Grainola... Foraker... Bigheart... Pearsonia... Bartlesville Municipal Airport... Hulah... Sunset Lake... Osage Hills State Park... Okesa... Webb City... Wah Sha She State Park... Apperson... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
